title: ‘An Important Prelude to Opening Weekend’: Wout van Aert Commences Quest to Find Missing Monuments
content:
Will Van Aert break his Flanders-Roubaix curse in 2024? Form-finding February racing in Spain, Portugal will give clues.

Read the full article at ‘An Important Prelude to Opening Weekend’: Wout van Aert Commences Quest to Find Missing Monuments on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
